tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing this review based on my and my wife's experience over the past 1.5 years (the entire journey from pre-pregnancy to post delivery).

-----

We had an exceptional experience with Dr. Sutopa Banerjee and her support team. The care and compassion we received was top-notch. Her expertise and experience made me feel at ease and comfortable throughout the duration of pregnancy. The support staff were friendly, caring, and went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met. The clinic was immaculate, well-maintained, and hygienic - a true testament to their commitment to patient care. We felt heard, understood, and empowered throughout our visits. We highly recommend Dr. Sutopa Banerjee and her team to anyone seeking outstanding gynaecological care. 5 stars and a huge thank you for an incredible experience!

Below are a few more details on above mentioned points (as per our collective experience):

Great Service:

- Prompt and efficient appointment scheduling
- Minimal wait time before the appointment
- Clear and concise communication from the doctor and staff
- Thorough and attentive care during the appointment
- Follow-up care and next steps clearly explained

Experience:

- The doctor's expertise and knowledge in her field
- The ability to answer questions and address concerns
- A clear explanation of diagnosis, treatment options, and procedures
- A willingness to listen and understand individual needs
- A sense of trust and confidence in the doctor's care

Compassionate Behavior:

- Empathy and understanding shown by the doctor and staff
- A caring and supportive attitude
- Sensitivity to individual needs and concerns
- A non-judgmental and welcoming environment
- Kindness and warmth shown throughout the appointment

Friendly and Caring Support Staff:

- Welcoming and friendly front desk staff
- Helpful and efficient nurses and medical assistants
- Clear communication from staff members
- A sense of teamwork and collaboration among staff
- A willingness to help with questions and concerns

Well-Maintained and Hygienic Clinic:

- A clean and tidy waiting room and exam rooms
- Up-to-date equipment and technology
- A sense of organization and efficiency
- Clear protocols for infection control and patient safety
- A well-maintained and comfortable facility

Thank you Sutopa mam and team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sutopa is a doctor with a magical touch. She is a brilliant medical professional and by nature she is very understanding and treats her patients very calmly and in a friendly manner. We have been consulting dr Sutopa since last 7years and since then , there has been no looking back. She has always been extremely supportive of our decisions and has always guided us with best possible solutions to our gynaec problems . 

My pregnancy journey started with few ups and downs as there were some complications. But dr sutopa guided me at every step of my pregnancy journey and helped me deliver a beautiful and healthy baby boy 2 months back and I cannot be more than grateful to dr Sutopa for making it happen so smoothly. 

We started with dr Sutopa from the day we started planning for a baby. She asked us to take few tests and also guided us to take pre-conception plan from curelinks . This really helped us conceive within 2 months of our visit to dr Sutopa. Once we conceived , we blindly followed her and did whatever was required to deliver a healthy baby. She was very polite and was always available on call to help us with smallest of the doubts. 

Her infectious smile is all that a person would need to make them feel good. After knowing her for so long, she is like a family to us and treats me like her sister . She has always been supportive and I can't think of anyone else for my gynae problems. I have even recommended her to my friends and family. All you need to do is trust her and she will take care of the rest.

We would like to extend our sincere thanks to mam and her team of doctors and support staff for giving us the most happiest and special moments our life .. May God bless you with good health and happiness and may you remain the source of happiness for many others just like us . 

Regards
Samarjit and Parul

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She was very pleasant and put me at ease immediately. Also she made sure she informed me about everything and asked for my consent following any procedure. For a first appointment, I liked her!

I used to text her my doubts at all hours and she always replied. She has a calm and pleasing demeanor which puts you at ease. And her staff is also very helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor made us very comfortable , answered all our queries in a very simple way , explained why certain investigations were required and the need for a surgery. 
Pre surgery and post surgery , she and her team regularly checked my progress which gave me a lot of confidence. 
Her staff is also quite efficient and extends all possible help with respect to coordination with the hospital and other agencies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, 
Thank you so much for brining us beautiful daughter into this world. Our pregnancy journey was beautiful but could not be possible without your continous support. We will forever remember your wonderful care and gudiance. This is our second child  pregnancy.We visited to Dr Sutopa with confusing mind that whether we should go with this preganancy or not as our first pregnancy was having complications.She explained us everything and did all required investigations and convinced us that this second pregnancy is God's miracle and we should go for this. We took decision to go further with this pregnancy and by God's grace on 9 May 2024 she delivered us a beautiful daughter and younger sister to my 5 year old son. Also I can definitely say that her availability is superb. The moment you pinged her for any concerns and within 5 minutes you get reply that too in Sundays.
Last but not least I can say if you taking treatment from her means you are in safe hands. 

Regards,
Kawal & Kanwar

Excellent Experience with Dr. Sutopa for Normal Delivery

I recently had the pleasure of being under the care of Dr. Sutopa for the delivery of my baby, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the experience. Dr. Sutopa is an exceptional professional who truly prioritizes the well-being of both mother and child. From the prenatal appointments to the delivery room, Doctor and the entire provided exceptional care and support.

Thanks to Dr. Sutopa’s expertise and dedication, I was able to have a smooth and successful normal delivery. I am incredibly grateful for her exceptional care and would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a ************* *** compassionate obstetrician.

We (I & my wife Anjali Rani) are extremely grateful to Dr. Sutopa Banerjee for his great support and guidance throughout the pregnancy journey. She is one of the finest gynecologists we have ever met. During our every visit she was too calm, detailed and expert in her approach and guided us perfectly on the dietary and other precautionary measures to be taken during pregnancy. Thanks to Dr. Sutopa’s unwavering support and care, we welcomed a cute baby girl as addition to our family. We strongly recommend Dr. Sutopa for all gynecology and obstetrics related requirements* ** *** ** *** **** * **** ****** *** * **** ***** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am delighted to share my positive experience with Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, a phenomenal doctor who has truly exemplified patience, perseverance, and expertise throughout my pregnancy journey. From the very first consultation to the delivery room, she has consistently gone above and beyond to ensure a smooth and comfortable experience for me.

One of the most remarkable qualities of Dr. Sutopa is her unwavering patience & being always available to address the concern even on call or message. She always took the time to listen to my concerns, address any questions I had, and provide thorough explanations at every stage of my pregnancy. Her calm and reassuring demeanor immediately put me at ease, making me feel confident and supported throughout the entire process.

Moreover, she demonstrated remarkable perseverance, guiding me through challenges and setbacks with determination and positivity. She never wavered in her commitment to my well-being, always exploring every possible avenue to ensure the best possible outcome for both me and my baby.

What truly sets her apart is her expertise and skill in facilitating natural deliveries. Despite the anxieties and uncertainties that come with childbirth, she made the entire process feel effortless. With her expert guidance and encouragement, she empowered me to embrace the experience of childbirth with confidence and strength.

Thanks to Dr. Sutopa's exceptional care, I was fortunate to have not just one, but two normal deliveries, each one a testament to her dedication and skill. She made pregnancy look easy, but it is her dedication, compassion, and expertise that truly made my pregnancy experience smooth and memorable.

In conclusion, I cannot recommend her highly enough. Her patience, perseverance, and unwavering commitment to her patients make her an outstanding doctor in every sense of the word. I am immensely grateful for her exceptional care and support throughout my pregnancy journey.

I'm delighted to hear about your positive experience and successful delivery. Providing thorough care with compassion is at the core of what I do, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to support you..Your trust means everything to me. Wishing you continued health and happiness.

Her staff is also very very supportive. Thank you MadamParents of Twins- Anita & Gyanesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Banerjee is an absolute godsend when it comes to gynecological care. I have had the pleasure of being under her expert care for the past 5-6 years, starting with my first pregnancy and continuing through various other gynecological issues. Let me tell you, she is hands down the best gynecologist one can find!

From the moment I stepped into her office, I knew I was in capable hands. Dr. Banerjee's extensive knowledge and expertise shine through in every interaction. She is able to accurately diagnose her patients with pinpoint precision, leaving no room for doubt. What truly sets her apart is her ability to suggest the most practical and effective treatments. She takes into consideration your individual circumstances and provides customized solutions that work wonders.

But it's not just her expertise that makes her exceptional; it's her incredible bedside manner as well. Dr. Banerjee is patient, warm, and incredibly easy to talk to. She creates a safe and comfortable environment that allows you to openly discuss your concerns. I have never felt rushed during my appointments with her. In fact, she takes the time to thoroughly explain any problems, ensuring that you fully understand the situation at hand. Her genuine care and dedication to her patients are truly commendable!

During my first pregnancy, I made the decision to have an elective C-section, and it was Dr. Banerjee who guided me every step of the way. I cannot express enough gratitude for her unwavering support throughout my entire pregnancy journey. She took the time to address all my fears and questions, providing clear explanations and solutions. She empowered me to make the best choice for both my baby and myself. Trusting Dr. Banerjee with the delivery of my precious little one was the easiest decision I ever made. Her expertise and compassionate care allowed me to feel safe and secure, knowing that I was in the best hands possible.

Even now, in the midst of my postpartum journey, Dr. Banerjee remains an invaluable part of my life. Her unwavering support and guidance have been a saving grace. I can confidently say that I wouldn't be where I am today without her exceptional care.

When it comes to recommending a gynecologist, Dr. Banerjee is always at the top of my list. I have enthusiastically referred her to friends and family, and without fail, they too have fallen in love with her. She truly has a knack for making everyone feel comfortable and cared for. Dr. Banerjee's expertise, compassion, and dedication make her the perfect choice for anyone seeking unparalleled gynecological care.

Thank you, Dr. Banerjee, for being the beacon of hope and exceptional care in my life. You have forever earned a special place in my heart!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sutopa Banerjee is incredible. She is lovely to speak with at every appointment which we had taken during my wife’s pregnancy period. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care.
We barely waited to be helped when we checked in or called at the Dr. Sutopa Banerjee’s complete care for women. We especially loved how Dr. Sutopa Banerjee really took her time to explain the conditions with us as well as my wife’s treatment options. 
Due to our change in city and unavoidable circumstances we had to move in the mid of lmy wife’s pregnancy period. But it was really felt great when the other doctors (a senior professional having 45 years of experience) praised how Dr. Sutopa Banerjee managed the initial complication which was appeared for my wife’s pregnancy. 
Staffs were great too. We are very impressed with the overall experience. Dr. Sutopa Banerjee is totally recommend. It is not only the name of ‘complete care for women’ it is truly “complete care for women”.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am thrilled to share my extraordinary experience under the care of Dr. Sutopa Banerjee during the delivery of my baby. From the initial moments of my pregnancy to the joyous day of my baby's arrival, Dr. Banerjee's unwavering dedication, profound expertise, and exceptional guidance left an indelible mark on my heart.

From our very first meeting, Dr. Banerjee's warm demeanor and approachability made me feel at ease. Her ability to listen attentively to my concerns and preferences created an environment of trust and understanding. What set her apart was the meticulous guidance she provided regarding my diet and essential vitamins. Dr. Banerjee's comprehensive explanations about the nutritional requirements during pregnancy were enlightening and empowering. Her personalized recommendations were not only insightful but also integral to ensuring a healthy and balanced pregnancy journey.

Throughout my prenatal visits, mam displayed a remarkable blend of medical mastery and genuine empathy. Her willingness to patiently explain complex medical concepts in a clear and relatable manner showcased her commitment to keeping me informed and involved in my healthcare decisions. This approach empowered me to actively participate in my journey and make well-informed choices.

When the momentous day of delivery arrived, Mam’s presence was a source of immense comfort. Her composed and confident demeanor instilled a sense of reassurance during a time that can be filled with anticipation. The seamless coordination with the delivery team and her transparent communication about the process ensured that I felt supported and informed every step of the way.

The delivery itself was a testament to Dr. Banerjee's exceptional skills and care. Her precise and skillful approach, combined with her unwavering focus on my well-being and that of my baby, resulted in a safe and successful delivery. Dr. Banerjee's attentive support throughout labor and delivery was a testament to her commitment to providing comprehensive care.

In the postpartum period, Dr. Banerjee's dedication to my recovery and well-being continued to shine. Her guidance on postnatal care, along with her ongoing support, eased the transition into motherhood and helped me navigate the initial challenges with confidence.

In sum, my journey with Dr. Sutopa Banerjee was an unparalleled experience of care, expertise, and guidance. Her holistic approach, combined with her exceptional medical knowledge, transformed my pregnancy and delivery into a joyous and empowered experience. Dr. Banerjee's dedication, compassion, and unparalleled expertise make her an exemplary gynecologist and obstetrician. Without hesitation, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sutopa Banerjee to anyone seeking a healthcare partner who goes above and beyond to ensure a safe, healthy, and memorable pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Banerjee is really very good in Her work. 

Me and my Wife's journey to become parents started in Feb, we rushed to nearest Gynecologist i.e. Nanda hospital Chhaterpur. Doctors in that hospital are really
good but we wanted someone that could provide us help and guidance in this journey off the clinic/hospital too whenever we are in need. I was really worried about
it and then I used Practo to find nearest gynecologist and shortlisted two but chose Dr. Sutopa due to her details and patient feedback. Obviosly not all feedbacks
are good but lets be honest one or two reviews doesn't help you pick or drop.

So we visited her then she explained things very nicely, we didn't have to ask her anything, it is like with her experience of more than 2 decades she know what 
could be the psyche of patient and what are their most probable concerns. With her first consulation we were happy but going forward I saw that she is writing many 
tests at every stage and also used to prescribe many medicines, at this stage you might discuss this with your friends and family, some of them surely will say this 
doctor is doing this for monetary benefit blah blah but trust me you need to TRUST Dr. Banerjee because this is what we did at every stage.

Like most of the people we also wanted Normal delivery but we will be honest we did not have too much confidence because my wife's pain threshold is very low and when 
due date was nearing we used to discuss this to make up our mind so that when time comes we don't get nervous or demotivated. We discussed this with doctor and she told us
we can decide if we want but we will wait till 40 weeks for normal delivery unless there is any complication found, and at this point i would like to highlight that she has
no agenda other than making sure Mother and Child both are safe and healthy. So if takes to write multiple tests or to prescribe medicines for mother, that looks
money making agenda to some people, she will do that. She is really SOFT SPOKEN and KIND but she wont let you take her lightly when comes to patient care. 

After waiting for 34 weeks there was Preterm labor and we were not happy because that means Mother and baby both will have to suffer but Dr. Sutopa made it go away
with immediate hospitalization of my wife and 2days of care, by the way she operates and delivers baby in Fortis hospital Vasant Kunj. And after waiting 3 more
weeks i.e. in 37 weeks 4days time came and we reached hospital and she saw my wife in labor and she knew about her pain threshold so she prescribed Epidural to ease with labor
but did not chose to do C-Section and with all these we saw our beautiful Girl Child and we were too happy as our WISH came TRUE.

With above story of more than 37 Weeks I would like to Suggest to try Dr. Sutopa Banerjee. Complete Care of Women with Warmth, Kindness.

Also Staff at her clinic are also very nice, kind and Friendly.
reply_text:
Hi,
Your positive feedback is greatly appreciated. We aim to deliver the best standards of Women healthcare. Your words motivate us to provide all our patients with the best service possible.

review:
With hearts overflowing with joy and gratitude, we would like to extent heartful appreciation to our gynecologist Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, whose guidance has illuminated every step of our journey towards parenthood!

With each prenatal visit, your comforting words and meticulous attention to detail filled us with confidence and reassurance, transforming what could have been a daunting experience into a journey of joy and anticipation.

And as the momentous day of delivery arrived, your steady presence and expert care transformed what could have been a moment of anxiety into a celebration of life's greatest miracle 🥰🥰.
With your skillful hands, you ushered our precious bundle of joy into this world, ensuring a safe and smooth delivery that exceeded our wildest dreams.😇😇

Today, as we hold our healthy newborn in our arms, we are eternally grateful for the extraordinary care and compassion you have bestowed upon us.
We would also like to shine a spotlight on the extraordinary support and kindness bestowed upon us by the remarkable duo, Shrawan and Pinki, during our prenatal visits.

#Gratitude #MiracleOfLife #BlessedWithBabyBoy #DrSutopaBanerjee

review: Dr Sutopa Banerjee was the first doctor to take my pain seriously and diagnose the problem correctly. After having borne the pain for two years, I got the diagnosis I needed and treatment for it. She is friendly, non-judgemental and sensitive to patient’s needs. She also gives adequate time to explain the problem and the solution so one knows what’s happening with the body. I am glad I came to her for a second opinion otherwise I would still be living in extreme pain due to adenomyosis and endometriosis. I plan to continue to consult for my treatment and management.

review:
Satisfied with her medical explanation and opinion of my various issues discussed. Trust her expertise and process. 

She is a cautious doctor, sometimes a few investigations seem unnecessary and expensive. 

Helped me through cesarean section and fibroid removal surgery at the same time. A very good surgeon indeed. Have not encountered any complications so far. 

The clinic experience was very good. Well maintained and easy appointment booking process. Recommended. 

Would like to thank her for delivering my sweet little bundle of joy safely and in best health.

review: I am delighted to share my positive experience with Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, a phenomenal doctor who has truly exemplified patience, perseverance, and expertise throughout my pregnancy journey. From the very first consultation to the delivery room, she has consistently gone above and beyond to ensure a smooth and comfortable experience for me.One of the most remarkable qualities of Dr. Sutopa is her unwavering patience & being always available to address the concern even on call or message. She always took the time to listen to my concerns, address any questions I had, and provide thorough explanations at every stage of my pregnancy. Her calm and reassuring demeanor immediately put me at ease, making me feel confident and supported throughout the entire process.Moreover, she demonstrated remarkable perseverance, guiding me through challenges and setbacks with determination and positivity. She never wavered in her commitment to my well-being, always exploring every possible avenue to ensure the best possible outcome for both me and my baby.What truly sets her apart is her expertise and skill in facilitating natural deliveries. Despite the anxieties and uncertainties that come with childbirth, she made the entire process feel effortless. With her expert guidance and encouragement, she empowered me to embrace the experience of childbirth with confidence and strength.Thanks to Dr. Sutopa's exceptional care, I was fortunate to have not just one, but two normal deliveries, each one a testament to her dedication and skill. She made pregnancy look easy, but it is her dedication, compassion, and expertise that truly made my pregnancy experience smooth and memorable.In conclusion, I cannot recommend her highly enough. Her patience, perseverance, and unwavering commitment to her patients make her an outstanding doctor in every sense of the word. I am immensely grateful for her exceptional care and support throughout my pregnancy journey.

review: We are grateful to God that we got to know Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, just in time. We were in the 7th month of pregnancy, feeling lost and anxious after a series of unsatisfactory experiences, despite approaching some reputed gynaecologists in the town. We appreciate how Dr. Banerjee understood our case and provided us with immediate and appropriate support for a successful delivery in the end. She also provided us with an opportunity to have a natural delivery, that we were always inclined towards, as a couple. We want to thank the entire team at her clinic, including Pinki, Shravan and Zainab, who maintain the culture of warmth, care and personal attention for all the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were very sad and disappointed as my wife's first pregnancy was going towards missed carriage, so we searched google for best Gynaecologist near me, and google showed result and we came accross Dr. Sutopa Banerjee's profile we went through many reviews, success stories of the patients and we visited Dr. Sutopa Banerjee's clinic and explained our experience which we had from previous gynaecologist. I was able to share our previous experience with her because of her friendly behaviour and she listens to all the problems/concerns we had. *** ** *** **** ************** She tried all her best to save my wife's first pregnancy but it was too late. After that she did some tests and found the cause and she worked with all her knowledge and everything what ever she can, and now we have been blessed with a baby boy because of her care, support and love (with thoda sa daant😊). I don't know how other doctor treats their patients but she was worried more than us and I know why because she calls my wife "Beta" whenever we visited her. She was there for us whenever we needed her. She treated us like we were her child. All staff are also good and polite and build friendly connection. On 27th May at around 4:50 AM my wife said water is leaking and she call Dr. Sutopa Banerjee and she asked to get admitted. My wife was very nervous and scared that what will happen, everything is fine or not, my wife was continuously asking when Dr. Sutopa will arrive, and when she sees Dr. Sutopa all her fear were gone and she said "ab mujhe darr nahi lag raha, apni Dr. aa gai mujhe darr nahi hai sab accha hoga ab" and yes all went well and we have a new member in our family because of her🙏🙏. Thank You Dr. Sutopa Banerjee for giving us our little Superman and giving blessings to him. 🙏🙏

I started visiting Ma’am in end of 2019 when we started planning however I had PCOS/PCOD so Ma’am asked me to go through several tests and  when we were through all those tests in 2020, we had covid at its peak so me and my husband put stop to our doctor visits and in March 2022, we visited Sutopa Ma’am and discussed everything with her and further with her guidance we conceived in June 2022. context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
Hi Fortis Vasant Kunj, 

Dr. Sutopa Banerjee my gynecologist showed up for me like an angel. Who made my experience at Fortis Hospital Vasant Kunj a wonderful one.
Dr. Sutopa and her team are doing a great job at Fortis. Everyone was at their best, Dr. Sutopa is magical, no words to thank her enough. 
Also her PA is doing good work. The Labor room team, the nurses and the supporting staff all did their best, and are very professional.

I was happy with their services and returned home with my bundle of joy. 

Pregnancy Journey: 
My pregnancy journey was going smoothly until the 37th Week, everything was looking fine. I was very excited and fully prepared for the normal delivery. However, things changed overnight, we discovered on the 37th Week blood test, that I have a high risk pregnancy and I need to bring my baby out as soon as possible. As unexpected, not sure how to handle the situation, we were clueless on what action to take forward. Super stressful moments as my countdown was on. 
We re-discussed  the same with Dr. Sutopa. where she explains the current reality, possible circumstances, and available options and their possible 
consequences.  which certainly helped us to make the right decision at the right time. 

When I was in the Operation Theater I was extremely scared until I saw Dr. Sutopa. Everyone may have their own experiences of her. But for me the Aura that she carries to her profession is extreme - 
She stood there and did my delivery & operation just like a DEVI would have done. 

My family and I would like to sincerely thank Dr. Sutopa Banerjee and her team for their wonderful work.


Best regards,
Mamoni Tanti
Vasant Kunj

review:
Being parent for the first time, we were totally confused and had thousands of questions in our mind. With god's grace, we met with Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, who not only helped us to overcome the fears and/or challenges during pregnancy but turned that into a joyous and memorable journey. *** ** ********* ************* *** confident in her profession and guided us exactly what was needed at the right time. She is extremely polite and friendly. She responded to each and every questions (no matter how silly it was :P) during face-to-face consultation or on whatsapp.

In my case, initially she wanted to wait for normal delivery but things became a bit critical at the end of my pregnancy. It was already full term and could have ended up in a bad way. Dr. Sutopa took the right call and suggested for immediate admission for a complete day for monitoring. We are blessed with a healthy baby girl and all thanks goes to her only. She is now helping me with post-pregnancy care as well.

Finally we are really thankful to all the staffs in the clinic. They are also extremely helpful. they guided us from booking appointments, to getting the medicines or getting the blood tested and it's all under one roof which made everything very easy for us. The clinic is tidy and clean.

Honestly, we have no words to explain, how much grateful we are to her. 

So thank you so much again, Dr. Sutopa, for making our dream come true. We highly recommend her for Obstetrician/ Gynecological issues.

Regards,
Sanyal Family

review:
Hi everyone..let me start my journey...we had consulted Dr. Sutopa in Jan 2021 for usual check up as we were planning to have our first baby, she guided us through the steps by steps and my wife conceived in Feb 2021. We used to visit her clinic from all the way from Indirapuram to Vasankunj and she has been so calm, graceful and caring to treat us as her own family member. We had to stay in Bangalore for 4-5 months during this wonderful journey of 9 months as my wife was posted in Bangalore and Dr  Sutopa kept seeing us virtually with the same love and affection, we never felt like we are not around her. Finally, on 4th Oct, 2021, we have been blessed with an angel in Fortis Vasantkunj under Dr. Sutopa Ma'am supervision through normal delivery, she convinced us for normal delivery with all her gudinace and we followed her advice diligently and it was a very good decision for us. She kept on believing in us and we had our utmost belief in herself that as along as we are under Dr. Sutopa's Ma'am hand, we are in the safest place. Dr. Sutopa is eversmiling, compassionate and an amicable person who has her medical expertise for all your problems with a definite solution. She never gets irritated with our so many questions and queries, she betters your half of your problmes just by her graceful smile and advice. Just to mention here, our delivery became complicated at the last moment, however, Dr. Sutopa stood by us and she did her best to bless us with a healthy little angel for which we would be grateful forever to you ma'am. At last I would like to mention, it is being said as " Doctor is God", we really meant and felt this after meeting Dr. Sutopa Ma'am. Thank you so much ma'am for your kind supervision and love during our wonderful journey of this 9 months of pregnancy, look forward to stay connected with you in future as well.

Warm Regards,
Krishna & Shikha
(Proud parents of your first online Baby " Krishika" )

review:
Happy to share that I became proud mother of baby boy by normal delivery in this tough time of Covid19 pandemic. 

All thanks to Doctor Sutopa Banerjee and her team. 
 
With experience of my pregnancy, I learnt that the three most important people during the pregnancy are parents to be and doctor. So strongly advise to the couples to spend good time and energy in selecting the doctor. But once you select the doctor, start trusting him/her for the best result.

Like most of the parents, we also wanted to have normal delivery and did lot of research in selecting the doctor.

After first few visits of the Dr. S. Banerjee, I came to understand that doctor plays important role in mode of delivery (only after mother), but it's further depends on many other factors of pregnancy. So best we can do is give our honest efforts and make best possible decision in various situations during the different phases of pregnancy.

Dr. S. Banerjee has strong hold on the subject. She listened all the concerns patiently and offered different options for what I could do. It happens too often that doctors make patients feel trapped into one decision, this was not the case with Dr. S. Banerjee. I really felt in control over the situation and was able to use her as an educated resource to help me make the best decision possible. 

One of many quality of Dr. S. Banerjee is she speak to the point and on right time which is very effective and helped us.

During my visits, I found that the staff is also very helpful and care a lot about patients.

Thereafter, journey of 9 months remained easy under expert guidance and supervision of Dr. S. Banerjee. Only thing I did was stayed positive, stress free and religiously followed the Doctor’s advice.

Happy and Highly Satisfied Mother

Rajni J Bhardwaj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Trying to do, what we feel is the most difficult thing, i.e., express our gratitude for the love & care received from Dr. Sutopa Banerjee, a person who's not less than a God's Angel for us. A person who restored our faith in the profession of Doctor. Her infectious smile is all a person need to feel good. We had a baby boy, 2 months back & we give all credit to her for making it happen so smoothly. The passion she has for her work & the effort she gave in our case is unparallel. 

We still remember when we started visiting her, a bit nervous, we had lot of ambiguity in our mind, but she gave enough tym & efforts to make us comfortable & guide us through. As tym passed, she made the whole process, smooth, till my wife delivered. 

She was always available (even at late night hours), whenever we wanted a suggestion or clear our smallest doubt. As it was our first experience, we were extremely wary of everything & use to ask even the smallest things, but she was always patient enough to answer our weirdest queries.

Many people suggested us to switch our doctor, quoting that she is unnecessarily expensive, we stayed to her, coz we feel that without proper & regular check ups & medications, no one can access the growth of fetus. The final outcome has made our belief on her even more stronger & we r happy on our decision to continue with her.

After knowing her for over 10 months, she is more of a family to us. She has been like a mother to my wife, being strict as and when required & always patient, supportive & concerned. She is a synonym of her field & we can't think of any1 else.

We only recommend her to everyone. All you need to do, is to trust her & she will take care of the rest.

Thank you Madam, for giving us the most happiest & special moments of our married life. May God bless you with all happiness & good health & you be always remain a source of happiness for many others like us. We don't know, how to give ratings in 4* & 5*. For us you deserve the whole galaxy....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Sutopa Banerjee for my pregnancy. From the very outset, she very clearly explained all aspects of the high risk nature of my pregnancy in a clearcut and most importantly, reassuring manner. She ensured that I had more frequent check ups, necessary tests, took prenatal supplements and neccesary vaccinations and observed other precautions as directed by her, and she was always available over phone even at odd hours in case of any urgent queries. No doubt she is knowledgeable and an expert in her field, but more important than that, it is her calm and reassuring demeanour that helps put her patients at ease and put their trust in her. She has a team of very polite, professional and helpful staff at her clinic, which is so important for making her patients feel comfortable and at ease.

Thanks to Dr. Banerjee, we welcomed our healthy twin babies in September after a smooth sailing pregnancy, and she continues to guide us with postpartum checkups and her postpartum care plan which includes personalized diet plans, exercises, mental health classes, consultations with pediatrician, lactation consultant, etc.

tags: None
review: She now is just like a family member. That pleasant smile she greets everyone with is something me and my wife treasure most. Apart from being caring and patient listener as a doctor, she has great medical intuition.  When we first approached her we had already visited places like AIIMS, MAX, Fortis, Columbia Asia and couple of other top gynaes within Delhi NCR. We had become hopeless to the extent that we had started thinking of adoption. But she guided us without any over promises and suggested us long term treatment, due to which my wife's health improved a lot and we had a successful IVF baby. During the pregnancy, she was very caring and proactively monitored my wife's situation. We also cherish those moments when she tried to discipline us with her tough love approach. During child birth, had it not been for her unique medical intuition, our child could have suffered toxic exposure to his own excreta/laterine within the womb. But she guided us well and did the caesarian well in time to prevent such situation. For us, she is a god send. My wife is still under her treatment and we are thankful to god that he brought her in to our lives. She is the perfect example of how a doctor should treat his/her profession - as compared to the ones who treat this profession merely as a money minting machine without much regard for human life and emotions. God bless you Dr. Sutopa and all UR loved ones. May god continue to shower you with expertise and strength and health, so that you can continue doing god's good work.

tags: None
context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
"Journey of happiness wid Dr. Sutopa Banerjee"

We are visiting Dr. Sutopa since my wife and I started planning of having a new member in our family. We did lot of research on whom to consult, finally we got online reviews of Dr. Sutopa. We we're bit skeptical if there will be any issues or not. The moment we met doctor she was smiling and and positive about everything and prescribed some test. Where some tests were up and down but how she described it was amazing she said " everything look fine yeh thoda sa badha hua hai koi baat nahi medicine de dedenge". It was such a relief cause she handled it so humbly without creating any hype or panic.
After 2months we again visited Dr. And yes this was the day when we got a good news of confirmed pregnancy. Then regular follow ups started where my wife had several ups and downs as this was our first time. But at every stage Dr. Was so empathizing that we feel confident and positive this created a trust on her.The way she treated us was like her own family. 
Finally the day of labour started and we were prepared as she suggested about the preparation for admission.
After extreme labour pain of 9 hrs when there was no progress from fetus side during the last hour, she suggested if we want to go for a c-section? She gave us ample of time to think about all possiblities and options. So we decided to go for it. A C-section which was a hype for us and many of us ....trust me it was not at all frightening... It was a matter of max 30 mins procedure. I had chance to see this live ..all because of doctor and her team who allowed me to be with my wife during this procedure .. it cannot be expressed in words when you are the first one to see your baby in this world. 
Its not only mother and father who suffered these 9 months..... Its the doctor as well who took care of us as their family during any hour of clock. We are really thankful to Dr. Sutopa Banerjee for all her support and care she had shown. We have recommended her in past and we will strongly recommend her in future as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been consulting Dr. Sutopa Banerjee for the past 6 years for various gynae problems and since then there’s no looking back. Under her supervision I had undergone a laparoscopic surgery for ovarian cyst and that has helped me come out of the fear of surgery.

She has always guided me for going through normal procedures for pregnancy. There were certain complications in my first trimester for which I was put on bed rest for 2 months. Doctor made sure that I was following all the medication and treatment properly. The best thing that I like about her is that she’s always available on phone for any query or issues that you face. At times she would have called on her own after seeing the test reports advising what needs to be done.

The 9 months of pregnancy is a wonderful yet very difficult journey when anxiety levels reaches the peak as most of the things are not known to you. With the guidance of Doctor who always cheered me up to smile and remain stress free, I was able to deliver my first child without any complications.

Her staff is also very courteous and humble especially Shravan, Pinky and Sandhya. The clinic visit was so regular, almost twice a week for injections, follow up but they took care of me like an extended family member and made me feel like home.

I will highly recommend everyone to visit Dr. Sutopa Banerjee 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering with exremely painful periods due to adenomyosis and fibroids in uterus. With no relief from medicines and after visiting many doctors in last 2 yaers, I approached Dr Sutopo who advised hysterectomy as a permanent cure. Due to enlarged volume of my uterus, I had apprehensions if the surgery can be performed laproscopically. To my satisfaction, she performed a TLH with minimal blood loss and that too in almost an hour while the average time to perform a TLH is 2 to 3 hrs. Post surgey recovery is also satisfactory. Dr Sutopo is a very caring and friendly doctor. She patiently answers all your queries and makes you feel safe and comfortable. Highly recommended for gynae related issues Thanks a lot Doctor!

tags: None
review:
When I got the news that I am pregnant with Monochorionic-diamniotic twins, I consulted many gynaecologists before picking up on Dr. Sutopa Banerjee. While some doctors scared me off with possible complications during my pregnancy, Dr. Sutopa seemed more positive and confident in dealing with my pregnancy. 

She monitored my whole pregnancy very closely to ensure that both babies remain healthy and remain inside the womb for a minimum duration of 36 weeks.  

At 32 weeks, the ultrasound showed that while the first baby was vertex, the second baby was in transverse position. When the position of babies didn’t change till 36 weeks, Dr. Sutopa suggested a planned C-section. We planned the cesarean on 16 November 2016, but went in labour on 14th. 

In OT, when the whole team was ready to begin the C-section procedure, Dr, Sutopa noted that I was fully dilated and suggested a vaginal delivery, with the team ready for an emergency c-section. Not long from then, I had both my babies delivered vaginally, safe and healthy with me 
  
Would highly recommend and thank Dr. Sutopa to all the ‘would be moms’.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I know Sutopa ma’am for almost 5 yrs now and the only reason why she has been my doctor is because of how she makes you feel. I had a fibroid cyst and I had seen plenty of doctors but no one made me feel easy and comfortable and gave me asurance that it can be taken out laprosocopicaly and that we have tried everything with medicines before going for a surgery.

Then it was my pregnency with a lot of ups and downs like my progestrone being low and her giving me confidence that even with low egg count i can have a healthy pregnency and conception. In my 26th week i had slight bleeding for which she responded mid night and made me and my husband feel comfortable and that we are in good hands. In 36 week I delivered a beautiful baby girl (normal delivery all because of her) and were able to go back home the same day from the hospital. She did not let us panic due to the covid situation and kept assuring us that we are doing good. We just want to thank her from the bottom of our heart and to us she is next to god coz she was the one because of whom I have my daughter in my arms. Thank you ma’am.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I came to know about doctor Sutopa through Practo. At the time, I was going through tough times. Not knowing what to expect, I remember feeling a bit anxious on my first day of visit. However, with every passing visit, I came to know and realize that I am in good hands.

It has been over good one and half year since that first interaction and it has been a wonderful experience so far. She helped me with my treatment and the result was that I delivered a healthy baby boy on 28th Feb 2018! After endless struggle of 4 years, this was the happiest moment we could ever hoped for.

After all this time, I can vouch for her that she is the best! You can talk to her about almost anything. You can pour out your heart, ask a number of questions to which you will get a warm smile and of course, relevant answer to your questions. 

I recommend her to everyone who is looking for a friendly yet someone who will also help you with accurate and efficient treatment. Place your trust on her & she will take care of the rest.

Thank you doctor for your endless support and guidance all these years. Most of the important is for giving us our life :)

May God bless you and your family with all the happiness one could ever hope for.

Radhapyari

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been visiting Dr Sutopa for more than a year now, and we have our angel delivered to us on June 9th, 2017 at fortis hospitals Vasant kunj. 
There was a complication during the very first month of the pregnancy, however with the able expertise of the doctor, the complication did not take a toll on either the mental or physical health of the mother.  Most surprising part was the D day, it was an anxious wait outside the labor room for close to 2 hour, and guess what we have our daughter delivered to us with Normal delivery. The baby weight was close to 4 kg, and in any normal circumstances a Doctor would have gone for C section, if it not have been Dr Sutopa. Doctor and her team did here best and successfully performed the Normal delivery. Not only that, she was able to make the labor pain fading away so quickly. We can't thank enough to Dr Sutopa for making us Proud parents with such a relaxed atmosphere around.

Impressive parts:
- Honesty and Ethics
- Friendliness 
- Timeliness (Respect for the appointment time)
- Patient care (Normal delivery is the proof)

Best,
Ashwini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I'm not sure how to begin to thank you.  My husband and I have never met such, sincerely interested in their patients well-being, doctor.  You are incredible at what you do and we're SO thankful we found you!
Thank you for delivering Ivanshi and all the care leading up to the delivery. I have recovered well and appreciate all the advice and tips you gave me beforehand about how to deliver a baby. The class you recommend at The Cradle was fantastic and helped me to feel less anxious about the process. I look forward to seeing you again when I become pregnant again.
Delivering my latest baby was much easier than I anticipated. Thank you for coming to the hospital during the late evening to deliver Ivanshi. I was very glad to have you there since you’ve been caring for me since the start the pregnancy. Your easy going manner helped me to relax. I am glad everything went so well!
Thank you for recognizing that I needed to have an emergency C-section, your quick decision and analysis of the situation likely saved my life and the baby’s. We will always feel grateful towards you. Ivanshi and I are both recovering well.** ******* **** *** *** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ****** God bless you.

tags: None
review:
Pregnancy for a woman is life's greatest blessing. The feeling of a life growing inside you is God's greatest gift, a woman can get. I have been really very lucky to have Dr Sutopa as my guiding "Angel" during that special phase of my life. 
After realizing I was pregnant, my husband and me started searching about various gynaes available in Gurgaon. Haven gone through lots of ups and down earlier in life for several years, I was very apprehensive about gynaes in particular, but the moment I started describing my condition to Dr Sutopa, it appeared that all my worries have gone and we got a feeling that we are in safe hands now. 

She has really been very supportive, helpful, kind and a wonderful human being with a very sweet smile. The safety of mother and child has always been her concern. She is the one who understands the tensions and emotional condition of a first timer mother, I remember when I was 28 weeks pregnant, I had called her up at night around 12:30 to describe certain complications, she patiently listened to me and advised me certain medications, later she called me back at 3 AM to check my condition, I was really touched with this caring gesture of hers. 

She is the one who sticks only to necessary medications and tests. Finally around 2 weeks back we are blessed with our cute little bundle of joy, all thanks to Dr Sutopa, our guiding angel. Thanks mam for everything.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: When I got to know I am expecting, my family was on cloud 9 with joy. I had a trip planned all tickets hotel was booked. For initial consultation I went to see some gynaecologist, she told me all is good and I can go on planned trip.My sister was not convinced, she was worried that due to my age and thyroid I need to be extra careful and should not travel. She advised me to get 2nd consultation then I visited Dr. Sutopa. During my first meet when I asked about travel , Dr. told me straight away that she need to conduct some tests. She would recommend travel only after checking my reports. That was " trust winner" for my family. My reports were not good and I was advised complete rest, no travelling in any case. My pregnancy had multiple complications fibroid, protein deficiency etc. Dr. Sutopa was like guardian angel who kept a  watch over me and my baby. If today I am healthy mother of healthy baby girl after my c section surgery along fibroid removal surgery all credit goes to Dr. Sutopa. For all would be parents ...I would advise if you do not want to spend 9 months worrying about mother and child well being .....please consult her. May god bless you Dr. Sutopa with all the happiness in the world ....highly grateful from bottom of my heart 🙏.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had been to Dr.Sutopa soon after my marriage three years back, and because of how comfortable she made me feel while being wholly professional and excellent with her medical advice, when I thought I might be pregnant earlier this year, my husband and I wasted no time in going back to meet her.

Dr.Sutopa has been absolutely wonderful over the last 9+ months and has guided us through our pregnancy every step of the way. From being available absolutely any time we needed her, answering even the most silly doubts and questions, to giving importance to our delivery-related wishes as far as was possible without causing harm to the baby, Dr.Sutopa has been so much more than just a doctor through our pregnancy. 
Her medical advice has been sound from the get-go, and her calm demeanor even when I contracted COVID-19 in April, helped me stay calm right through. Any time we were faced with a slightly complicated situation, Dr.Sutopa took the time to decide what she felt would be the best course for both me as well the baby, without just rushing into anything, and this only increased our level of confidence in her advice.

Dr.Sutopa has been a friend and guide while being wholly professional and extremely competent, and that isn't a very easy balance to maintain. Her entire team, both in her OPD clinic as well as in Fortis, took the best possible care of us, and for that and so much more, my husband and myself, and our families, will be forever grateful.

review:
This was my first pregnancy and I was very very scared and had many many questions in my mind related to it. Dr. Sutopa made my pregnancy journey smooth and comfortable. From counselling in the beginning of my pregnancy till the delivery she was there to support and guide me.  I had few complications from the beginning till the end but under her guidance and suggested medication I was able to sail through all those complications easily. In the hospital on the D day she and her team were very good and took great care of me and the baby. Rest of my stay in the hospital was comfortable as she and her team of doctors made sure to pay visit time to time and keep a check on my condition. 
Dr. Sutopa's happy and friendly attitude made me feel comfortable in asking her n number of questions during my visits or on what's app. She was prompt enough to answer the questions or any doubt that I had.  
I had a c-section delivery for which she made sure that I do not feel scared about it. She discussed my situation very openly and frankly with me and my husband and helped us in taking a decision for c-section delivery with assurance that it will be smooth as my entire pregnancy went. 
At the end I am happy to say this I have been blessed by a baby boy with the help of Dr. Sutopa. 
Thank you Dr. Sutopa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am blessed with twins last month . It is considered to be high risk pregnancy. I can not thank Dr. Banerjee more for such a smooth pregnancy and delivery. I just followed her instructions and got the best result possible. Well there are every chance of preterm delivery but thanks to doctor I have completed 37 weeks . My kids were not kept in NICU even for two hours. The moment my wife came from OT they handed over my kids to me. Dr. Banerjee is so accurate with her dosage and timing of medicines . She knows when to start Progesterone , and other medicines which helps to sustain the pregnancy. I do not know when she takes time for her sleep , You get replies immediately even at 2 AM .  or be it at 6 AM. She is easy to reach . She is polite and and listen to your query patiently and will guide you accordingly. Friends there might be other good doctors around but trust me for high risk pregnancy she is the only one i can think of.  During 37  weeks i did not have any issue , it is no less than a miracle . Thank you Doctor ! and on a lighter note  yes she allowed me to have a burger a day before my delivery which was not allowed for entire pregnancy. :)

context: Pregnancy care and management,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: I am so much elated to write this review about Sutopa maam. She is truely a gem of person. I  got in touch with Sutopa maam much before my pregnancy. I went to her to seek treatment for vaginal candidiasis in 2019. I cannot emphasize enough how amazingly she comforts her patients and attend their needs. Once my treatment for candidiasis was over, she started guiding me to conceive. Too good to be true, but under her planned guidance, i conceived within a month of trying. First few months of my pregnancy I was away in a different city but her constant telephonic guidance helped me to stay confident till I reached Delhi in my 2nd trimester. She is super kind, knowledgeable and always reachable at the time of need, even at the most odd hours. I trusted her for my pregnancy and can proudly say, that i couldn't have had a better doctor than her. I had a few complications during the last few weeks of my pregnancy when I developed GDM and ICP and started feeling so stressed. But with Dr. Sutopa's guidance, i delivered successfully on June 25th and is blessed with a beautiful baby girl. Besides GDM and ICP, I had a couple of other issues which made my pregnancy high risk and I was advised elective Cesarean section considering the baby's safety. I can literally vouch on her expertise and would definitely recommend her to anyone seeking advanced treatment in obstetrics and gynaecology. Thank you once again, ma'am for all your support 🙂.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am writing this review after 3 months from when my mom had her surgery.

We consulted all highly recommended gynaecologists for my mother as her case was very complicated because her surgery was pending for years and had caused a lot of complications because of which a laproscopy couldn’t be performed. Getting this done during the times of covid was another challenge as the availability of resources in hospitals was limited. 

When my mother met Dr. Sutopa, as scared as she was, Dr. Sutopa showed a lot of compassion, understanding her situation and made her feel confident about going through this process. So we finalised this is the doctor she feels safest with.

When the surgery started, there were more complications than what we expected and Dr. Sutopa handled the situation with utmost diligence and care. The surgery lasted longer than we expected and unforeseen circumstances arose. During the surgery, my mother’s urine bladder got bruised(which happens often) and the doctor did her best and responded to the situation immediately and had other doctors onboard. (I am mentioning this because we have heard from other patients that they get to know about this injury after the surgery which had them suffer fir long)

Now, after 3 months, we have seen our mom recover well and really fast and we are glad that we consulted Dr. Sutopa.

She has full clarity in her thoughts, which reflects in her advices which helped us to trust her and decide regarding our baby’s delivery in Delhi itself. May God bless her and her family with all prosperity and happiness.
It’s been 22 days, Suryansh has not let us sleep at all (in a good way 😊). As any other expecting couple, it’s a pursuit of happiness mixed with bouts of pain for any would be parents. We came across Dr. Sutopa Banerjee’s clinic. After visiting her, she listened to us patiently, what our expectations were and asked us for some required tests and USG related to pregnancy confirmation. We did those tests and then after analyzing the all the test and USG report, we were informed that the child was not growing as should be and were advised some injections and medicines. We decided to stay back in Delhi and deliver our baby under her. It was not an easy decision for us. We were guided all throughout, at the time of my wife’s dengue at the end of the 1st trimester, then at the time she suffered from cough and cold in the end of her 2nd trimester and near the end of her 3rd trimester, when her sugar level was fluctuating and was not under control due to her gestational diabetes. Dr. Sutopa asked us, if we wanted to stay on with the pregnancy or deliver through c-section, since as per her the baby was healthy and it was optimal time for delivery for both mother and the would be baby.
We had total faith in our doctor, hence we decided to go along with our doctor, which was one of the best decisions in our life. Hence after waiting for 38+ weeks under the guidance of Dr. Sutopa, we were blessed with a healthy baby boy through C-Section on 5th March, 2018.

Dr. Sutopa Banerjee is very kind, humble & caring towards her patients.
She listens her patients very warmely and gives enough time to patients to express their problems. She is very professional in her profession and she has vast knowledge of her profession. 

I was visiting to her since last eight months for my  Pragnency & Regular follow up, check ups. She has handled my  pragnency very carefully & professionally when I was due for early delivery after 37 weeks.

She has promoptly arranged for my delivery  at ......... hospital & successfully performed the delivery operation when I was in her clinic for regular check up.

I wish her great success in her profession in future.

(SANDHYA KAJALE)
Vasant Kunj,
New Delhi.

tags: None
review: My husband's cousin recommended Dr Banerjee to us. We couldn't have a better/safer pair of hands to bring our daughter into this world. Dr Banerjee is always there for her patients, we didn't have much questions though but she always encouraged us to ask more. Right from the second consultation visit, she made us feel like a part of the family. Guided us through the 9 months, during the delivery & now post delivery. The most striking feature apart from her med skills is her smile :). She will keep smiling while you ask questions/clear your doubts. Thats the doctor you want to have by your side during/after those 9 months. I would highly recommend Dr Sutopa because if & when I plan for the next child, I am for sure going to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Family Planning,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I’ve had the most fabulous experience with Doctor Banerjee. When my husband and I went to her- we had literally given up hope of becoming parents but she encouraged us. Not only did she patiently explain everything, but she also did not unnecessarily suggest IUI and IVF. My husband and I conceived naturally after trying for 10 years. I had a c section with her and it was extremely smooth- she was gentle and caring and did the surgery flawlessly. All my gynae check ups were done so gently, so well..I generally feel scared of Pap smears, pelvic check ups and in general was scared about pregnancy. But with dr Sutopa, it was such a smooth and lovely ride. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ** ****** ****** When I said I hv 9 months baby and didn’t want second baby now. She prescribed me to ultrasound to check 7 week completed or not . She said if your pregnancy is less than 7 week I prescribed pills for termination but she put the condition that I want ultrasound report from particular lab obviously from where she get pay off.after getting the report she said “u hv to pay 6000/- for medicine. U hv to take the medicine from my clinic only . I don’t prescribe any medicine for outside” . Never ever suggest any one to go to her.****** *** ******* ****  ** * **** ** *** ***** *** **** ** ******* *** ***** ******** * **** ** **** *** ******** ******** ** * ********** *** *** ** **** * *** ************* **** * ******** ******
reply_text:
Abortion is a procedure, with legal implications, proper protocol, and serious complications if not done properly and there is a charge for it which was pre-declared to you. By law it is to be done under a doctor’s supervision. Not the way you wanted to happen that I just write down the pills for you without any supervision. We never forced you for anything. You came up with a problem and we suggested you the solution. There is a professional fee to treat such a problem. You are not satisfied because you had affordability issues.
Ultrasound is required before such a procedure. You were suggested the nearest walking distance Center so that you could save some time, not that I get a commission.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After my first child, there was a significant gap before we planned to have another baby.. But I didn't conceive , so we sought Dr Sutopa's help. Fortunately, I conceived naturally in the second month only, after treatment. Needless to say Dr Sutopa is a brilliant doctor, who diagnosed my problem and her effective treatment helped me conceive. Dr sutopa practices her profession with responsibility and does not take it as privilege only.  In my last trimester I and my family were infected with Covid, I lost my father and had to go back to my hometown. Initially I had thought she might not like my decision... But not only was she extremely compassionate, helpful... But stay connected with me.. Whenever I needed her advice and help. 
Really difficult to find such genuine doctors .
Thank you doctor for all the help and support💕

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We heard about Dr.Sutopa Banerjee from a friend. He said , that doctor insisted for normal delivery even when his wife was having too much pain . A doctor who insists for normal delivery even when she can earn a lot suggesting C section , is a very good doctor.so we decided to meet her for pre pregnancy counseling from Dec 2020. since then she has helped us a lot . I have an existing condition of Rheumatoid arthritis also recently recovered from Covid. I also had a early miscarriage . She always listens to our concerns patiently. Sutopa mam has been very positive about my pregnancy ( 7 week) though I have had so many medication during covid infection. She does suggest so many tests , but we are okay with it as all the tests  are necessary. Generally other people don't do those tests , we are happy that we do .Hoping to deliver a healthy baby under her guidance .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
*** ** **** ************** intelligent and polite. Even after changing my doctor from a local one to Doctor Sutopa and starting treatment amid 5 month of my pregnancy, she treated me like her own child. I had not even undergone the basic tests required for a pregnant woman while getting treatment under local doctor. She advised me to get those tests done. To add to my problems and to make things more problematic, I was diagnosed with few health issues that hampers the baby’s development. Despite having all these complications and very less time to treat, through her guidance, aid, support and by taking right decisions at right time with her help I was able to give birth to a very healthy baby.
I am very pleased and happy to leverage this platform in thanking you Doctor Sutopa for all of your efforts that you have put on in adding a new life to our family. I would recommended her to everyone who are looking for a professional and well experienced doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Really dissatisfied with the visit. ** **** **** *** ****** ** * ******* * I was literally told everything in 2 mins *** ** ** *** **** ******** **** ****** ******* **** * ********* Moreover, she told me to get blood test done from her clinic ***** **** ** ** ******* ***** ** **** **** *** ******** **** ** *** **** ****** Also the test was supposed to be done on an empty stomach which I was not told ** ** ****** ** **** ** **** ***** *** ** ** ** ********* Will never go back. **** ****** **** ***** ** **** *** *** ***** *** ** *********
reply_text:
Dear Disha, as per the records, you spent 35 minutes in my chamber on your first visit and subsequently 18 minutes even on a FREE follow up visit in consulting with me. We have all computerised records of check in and check out timings. If you wish, we can email it to you so that your memory is refreshed. Our clinic has a lab facility which if you wish to avail of , you are most welcome. We never compel any patient to do it from us. It is for your convenience that the facility is under one roof. Every lab has its own prerequisites for conducting tests.
False allegations and misleading other patients from being able to reach out to a service is not a nice thing.As far as you are concerned you may not wish to come back that is your personal choice.But altering facts to negatively influence others is not good. 
Dr. Sutopa Banerjee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from acute pain in my pelvic area / lower abdomen because of huge cyst in my ovaries but I was not aware of it until I met Dr Sutopa. I had visited many gynaecologists and gastroentrolist (thinking the pain may be because of irritable bowel syndrome) before her but no one was able to identify the root cause of the pain.
I visited doctor Sutopa after reading online reviews and my experience with her has been great. She recommended appropriate tests and was able to identify a huge cyst in my right ovary which was around 15 X 15 cm which could have led to serious complications, there was cyst in my left ovary as well. 
She suggested for laparoscopic surgery at the earliest and was successful in removing the huge cysts from both the ovaries through laparoscopy. Usually these huge cyst require laparotomy but Dr Sutopa with her great expertise was able to remove it through laparoscopy.
I strongly recommend Dr Sutopa for all Gynae issues related to endometriosis/pcos/pcod/pregnancy/vaginal problems etc. She is very polite and humble doctor who gives ample time to her patients to discuss about their issues.
She truly justify her Clinic's title 'Complete Care For Women’.
Thank you Dr. Sutopa and her staff for taking complete care of me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We consulted Dr Banerjee for the birth of our second baby, and as our first child was born abroad this was our first childbirth experience in India. From our first meeting Dr Banerjee put us at ease and provided the same level of care, if not better, than what we had experienced abroad. She ably guided us through the entire nine months, advising on nutrition and supplements and encouraging me to remain active. When the time came the labour progressed smoothly and I was on track for a normal delivery but then complications arose when the baby became stuck and the doctor took the decision to deliver through caesarean as the child was in distress. Now barely six weeks later the baby thankfully is healthy and I have fully recovered from the operation and am back to my normal routine - running after a three-year-old and caring for an infant.
Today Dr Banerjee has become not only our go-to person but a friend, and a professional who always puts her patients first - a quality which anyone who has met her will surely attest to.

review:

Write only that Med which u will only get in her Med. Store.

reply_text:
Dear Babita
Kindly realize that calling on Doctor’s personal number is to be used for medical related emergencies only. Otherwise for regular queries or appointments you should use either messaging system or leave your message at the reception or if required visit.
Regarding charging you 25k  is totally baseless. You have paid only Rs.5440 at our clinic for 6 visits (we have all records of your bills). You visited me 1st time on 10th Dec 2016 with long term health problem and was put on corrective medications. You never came back for a follow up thereafter.
Regarding medicines, you were prescribed simple and widely available medicines.
Giving a negative feedback after almost 9-10 months of the visits itself suggests that it is ill-intentional.
You have not got results because you were impatient and expected unrealistic results in a very short time.
My best wishes are there for you to become a mother.

As per our records, you were sent for your consultation as per the scheduled queue. As far as my consultation with you is concerned, it is completely your opinion. review: It was really wonderful journey of us from one month to the end of delivery even after post delivery with Dr.Sutopa Banerjee. My wife was little nervous & the way Dr.Sutopa handled like her family member it is really remarkable.We had asked to go for various tests & as per the diagnosis report necessary steps had taken.Finally we are blessed with a baby girl by normal delivery. We have a great respect the way she remained alive the profession of a doctor & all our best wishes to Dr.Sutopa & team to continue such good work.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Her for Treatment of my wife and will like to key in some points i liked about this doctor. Since it was our second child so we we had a experience for doctors earlier. 

1. Friendliness : She always meets her patients with smile. Explains like a elder and talk like a friend

2. Cost effective : In house lab , and all medicines. We need not run around city for different things. One point solution and that 2 economic. 

3. Experience :  Highly experianced

4. Caring : Responds to patients even on phone. 

5. Motivational : always motivation for healthy living practices.

Last but least only doctor seen who always prefer normal delivery. She is there when ever is required .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have lost a baby at 5and half months pregnancy . We are under a lot of mental pressure . But the way the doctor help us throughout our next pregnancy is excellent and beyond doubt. She always increased our moral and faith . And it is due to her excellance that we go through our pregnancy and delivered a healthy baby . She gave us much needed self confidance . She was always ready to help us at any time of the day. ****** *** ** ****** ** *** *** ** . 
We are very thankful to her for her support and making us to feel proud for becoming parents at last . 
Thanks a lot mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sutopa Banerjee is the most keen and concerned Medical professional.

A elite, vibrant, down to earth person; she is a keen listener and notes each and every relevant things.

No extra Medicines, only and only the atmost required medicine.

A vast  ********* *** experience as an gynaecologist.

A good cooperative staff and quality patient care.

We have been visiting her since we knew we are expecting and everything is going on so smoothly upon her guidance that we both have not expected that being pregnant is so calm and composing for us. We are looking forward for safe and healthy proceedings *** ** *** **** **** ** *** ***** *** ******** ** *** **** ******** *** **** *** ** ******

tags: None
reply_text:
Dear Priyanka,
It is very unfortunate that people like you put allegation on a doctor of minting money who attends you on a National Holiday, 15th August, at regular consultation fee. 
You also put allegation on me of minting money by writing tests which help me diagnose and treat you scientifically and they were being done from your own chosen laboratory. You also forgot that your test results were abnormal for which I prescribed you medicines.
And finally you put allegation on me of not treating your actual problems which were related to long term nutritional deficiencies and hormonal issues without giving enough time for the results to come.
This is intentional defaming somebody on internet!
Still I like to wish you good luck and good health.
Dr. Sutopa Banerjee

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: my appointment was fixed at 11 am but turn come arround 2 pm that is time wasting . and other is i submitted 800 rupee as fees but she did not give  satisfactionary consultant.
reply_text:
Dear Rachna,
If you miss your scheduled appointment, you should be courteous enough to wait for your turn after those booked patients who have come on time. I saw you at 12:31 pm and not 2’o clock as you have mentioned. We keep all computerized records of your check in & check out timings.
As far as wastage of time is concerned, you have already wasted 4 precious months of your pregnancy without any treatment as it was the first time you were visiting a doctor, even being in the capital of India.
Regarding paying Rs.800 and not getting satisfied with consultation, I am here to guide you and not to please you and boost up your ignorance.
To get good results you should be receptive to good advice rather than criticizing unnecessarily.

review:
My overall experience with respect to treatment was not that good ** *********** ** ****** ** ******** Based on review I went to this doctor, however seems one has to experience by self to determine the worth. It’s difficult to find * **** doctor whose first priority is to save and cure the patients and not to burn the hole in patients pocket. 
Surely will never recommend to anyone.
reply_text:
Dear patient, 
As per records, you visited me 1st time 6 months back , perhaps based on reviews, had treatment from me and got well. I doubt if that time you recommended me to anyone for the good treatment that I gave you or gave a positive review to help others find a good doctor.
The second time you visited me 6 months later for treatment for a new episode of problem , as anybody else would do if only one had a good experience with me and not jut because of mere reviews. Had you not liked my treatment earlier you wouldn’t have visited me again I presume.
A mere consultation fee and 2 culture tests which were necessary for your diagnosis has burnt your pocket and has put a question mark on a doctor’s intentions of curing a patient. 
To add to it you didn’t even come back for a follow up after completion of your medicines or inform me of any issues if you were facing in the meantime. Had you had contacted me I would’ve surely helped you.
I hope the readers decide by their own judgement if they would like to visit me after going through my reply to your comments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

She even replys all the time whenever i ask any type of question...Only one issue from my side is the distance between my home and Dr's chamber.. .I always wish to be under her treatment in coming days...let see...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:

reply_text:
Dear Mr. Ajit Gupta,
It is your personal judgement and wish not to come back to me!
Being a busy doctor I am unable to thank my countless patients who write good things about me and inspire me to work better. But I regularly reply to my patient's doubts .  
You and your wife visited me for the whole 9 months of your pregnancy (11 times as per PRACTO records) and never found me rude and unjustified in my treatment! 
But in the last moment despite my repeated suggestions, you did not admit your wife to the hospital until she leaked for long 18 hours at home with all liquor drained out. There was no progress of labor and signs of developing infection had set in. Had I not delivered the baby by cesarean section, your wife today would have been in sepsis and your baby would be fighting with infection in the nursery. 
Whatever I have done is according to medical protocol, for the best interest of the patient and the baby and that too with your consent .
You have mistaken my concerns as rude behavior and drama (as per your language).
You should be ashamed of your rough words towards a respectful and reputed doctor!

reply_text:
Dear Laxmi, hope you are fine.
Thank you for appreciating me as a doctor. Just a small clarification about the medication charge which you felt was high. I would like to state that your clinical condition which you had presented with (bleeding in pregnancy) was a very critical condition. Such condition is likely to require more care and medication than a normal uncomplicated pregnancy thus increasing your cost. I wish you great 9 months of pregnancy ahead.
